title: UE5 Synonym Ring Database
description: Maps user search terms to canonical tag IDs. When a user searches for 'BP' or 'Visual Scripting', the system resolves to the canonical 'scripting.blueprint' tag. This improves search discoverability across different terminology users might know.

_design_notes.purpose: Bridge the gap between how developers describe problems and how we categorize solutions
_design_notes.usage: Query normalization layer - run user input through synonym lookup before tag matching
_design_notes.maintenance: Add new synonyms when users consistently fail to find content using common terms

synonym_rings._comment: Blueprint is the #1 searched term but users say 'BP' or 'visual scripting' interchangeably
Packaging has 7+ synonyms because the workflow spans build/cook/package/deploy
Lumen is UE5's GI system - many users don't know the name, just 'global illumination'
ExitCode=25 is the infamous 'Unknown Cook Failure' - users paste this from logs constantly
UMG is the formal name but users say 'UI' or 'Widget' far more often
C++ in UE has many nicknames including 'native code' and just 'code'
Nanite is UE5's geometry system - 'virtual geometry' is the technical term
Niagara replaced Cascade - many UE4 users still search for 'particles' or 'Cascade'
GPU crashes appear with many names - TDR, device lost, device removed
Control Rig is the new animation system - related to IK and procedural animation
MetaSounds replaced Sound Cues for procedural audio
Meta Quest has gone through several brand names - Oculus, Quest, Meta
Fab is the new unified marketplace - users still search for 'Marketplace' and 'Megascans'
Accessed None is THE most common Blueprint runtime error - many names for it

fuzzy_matching._comment: Rules to handle compound word and spacing issues common in search
fuzzy_matching.description: Normalizes user input before synonym lookup - handles typos and formatting variations

examples._note: Compound words are often written without spaces
Or with spaces where there shouldn't be
Error codes need exact formatting for lookup
